LanguageData.GR_InsanityCloud.label: invoke insanity
LanguageData.GR_InsanityCloud.description: Invokes the insanity of That Which Man Is Not Meant to Know
LanguageData.GR_DetonatePsionic.label: detonate psionic
LanguageData.GR_DetonatePsionic.description: Remotely detonate the psionic chemfuel reservoirs of this creature. The animal will be affected and damaged by the resulting explosion.
